net.identio.saml

Class AssertionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.identio.saml.AssertionBuilder

  • public class AssertionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    SAML assertions builder. This class must be used to generate a SAML assertion.
    Author:
    Loeiz TANGUY
